items.summary: Update the Motoko backend `answerQuestion(question : Text)` handler to recognize common positive/thank-you words and return an appropriate friendly response when they appear in the user input (e.g., "nice", "good", "excellent", "great", "thanks", and similar variants). Matching must be case-insensitive and work when the word appears alone or inside a longer sentence.
Add at least one example prompt in the chat UI to demonstrate the new positive/thank-you word recognition (e.g., add "Thanks" or "Great job" to the example prompt list).
